celebi.description: Celebi can be encountered after obtaining the GS Ball and visiting the Ilex Forest shrine.

lugia.description: Lugia can be encountered in the deepest chamber of the Whirl Islands.

ho-oh.description: Ho-Oh can be encountered at the top of Tin Tower.

raikou.description: Raikou, Entei, and Suicune roam throughout Johto after being awakened in Brass Tower.

entei.description: Raikou, Entei, and Suicune roam throughout Johto after being awakened in Brass Tower.

suicune.description: Raikou, Entei, and Suicune roam throughout Johto after being awakened in Brass Tower.

mewtwo.description: Mewtwo can be encountered in the deepest part of Cerulean Cave.

mew.description: Mew can be encountered at Faraway Island.
